title: Bentgo Classic - Aqua
description: Pack a hassle-free, healthy lunch with the convenient, stackable, and lightweight Bentgo Classic adult bento box. Whether you're headed to the office or just taking your meal on the go, this all-in-one food container is the perfect alternative to lugging around multiple lunch tupperware, bento boxes, and utensils. With Bentgo Classic, packing and transporting food is quick, simple, and eco-friendly. It includes two stackable containers with lids, built-in plastic silverware, and a nylon sealing strap for secure transportation. Not only does Bentgo Classic come in various stylish color options that are perfect for adults, but it is also microwavable, dishwasher safe, and made with BPA-free materials. Different-sized compartments allow you to pack all sorts of foods in healthy portions, as well as allow you to separate hot from cold meals. Simply pick, pack, and enjoy your food on the go in this convenient lunchbox container!FLEXIBLE ADULT BENTO BOX: The stackable design of this bento box is perfect for adults going to the office or on the go! The multiple layers add versatility to separate warm and cold foods - or use one layer for smaller meals. The containers easily nest together for space-saving storage!PERFECT FOR PORTION CONTROL: Whether it's for a new healthy lifestyle or meal prep - each compartment is perfectly portioned so you know exactly how much you're eating. The top tray fits two ¾ cup portions, and the bottom tray fits 2 cups of food.ALL-IN-ONE LUNCH CONTAINER: Don't worry about forgetting utensils or having to pack multiple lunch containers - this convenient all-in-one bento box includes a plastic utensil set and three different food compartments held together with a nylon strap.PORTABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Only 7 inches wide and 4 inches tall, this adult lunch box is inspired by Japanese lunch box designs and small enough to throw into any lunch bag - but still can carry a full breakfast, lunch, or dinner on the go.MICROWAVE AND DISHWASHER SAFE: Heating and cleaning up your meals is a breeze! Both main food containers are top-rack dishwasher and microwave-safe. Please note: this does not apply to the Bentgo top lid, divider, or nylon sealing strap.Note: Bentgo Classic is NOT leak proof. It does seal very well, but to be safe when packing dressing, fruit, and other liquids, keep Bentgo Classic upright during transport. Additionally, do not put the center divider or lids in the dishwasher or microwave.Size:7" (17.8 cm) x 4.5" (11.4 cm) x 2.5" (6.4 cm) (without divider)3.4" (8.6 cm) x 4.3" (10.9 cm) x 1.7" (4.3 cm) (each section)7'' (17.8 cm) x 4" (10.2 cm) (stacked lunch box)Total Capacity: 3 ½ cups | 28 oz | 828.1 mLTotal Container Capacity (per section): ¾ cups | 6 oz | 177 mLBottom Container Compartment Capacity: 2 cups | 16 oz | 473mLWeight: 12 ozMaterial:Food Container Material: BPA-Free PP PlasticTop Lid & Silverware: BPA-Free ABS PlasticTop Lid Sealer Lining: SiliconeDivider Lid: LDPESealing Strap: Nylon
